website_summaries.verdict: Well-constructed leggings from a top brand that stand out for being stylish and comfortable.
pros: Women loved the style of these leggings with their denim-like look, as well as the lightweight and stretchy feel
They also get top marks for their comfort factor and the fact they hold up well over time
cons: Tends to have some sizing inconsistencies
some customers felt these ran big while others felt they ran small
While most liked the fit overall, the waist is more structured than some other styles

customer_reviews.title: Love these jeans/leggings!
customer_reviews.text: These jeans are exactly what I was looking for. Lightweight, very thin (but not see through), stretchy, but still have a jean feel and look. Its the perfect balance between leggings and actual jeans. The stretch is perfect. They bounce right back. I only wish the pants came a little higher. They sit right at my belly button, which is good enough for covering the belly. I just like that extra security. I am 5'9, 260..the xxl fits perfect. The only other con, was it does not have "tummy control" to smooth the love handles or belly flub..but for the price I cant complain at all. Will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: T. Stanfield

customer_reviews.title: I was mainly concerned about the fit and appearance but they worked out great. The only con is I had to wear ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a part of my buzz lightyear costume. I was mainly concerned about the fit and appearance but they worked out great. The only con is I had to wear a pair of white tights underneath these because I could see the outline of my underwear in the mirror. If I would have worn a long top like I normally do with leggings, this wouldn't have bothered me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Awesome XL
customer_reviews.text: This leggings is really awesome good fit..i am 5'4 and it hits my ankles..its high waisted so i get tummy control..i ordered the XL.. i wear 16-18 pant size..it does have stretch.. i definately will purchase another
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Ramkissoon

customer_reviews.title: Am I even wearing pants?
customer_reviews.text: These pants are so see-through it is LAUGHABLE, literally I laughed. I might as well be wearing no pants at all. Seriously, don't buy them unless you want the whole world seeing all your bits even when clothed. I considered taking a photo, but I don't know where Amazon stands on nudity.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Diano

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the white ones medium size I’m 5’6 and 143 lbs kinda muscular. the size was fine but the material was so thin, my legs looked lumpy and it my rear look long/square like elephant. Not flattering on me.
customer_reviews.author: D5e

customer_reviews.title: I love the jean look and feel of these leggings
customer_reviews.text: I love the jean look and feel of these leggings. They are thicker than I expected and look really good with boots. I'm postpartum and still have a little bit of a belly so they were a little tight on my stomach but they are also more of a high rise fit. I'm 5.5, 145lbs and bought a medium but even though they are a little snug they still look and feel great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: <3 These are fantastic. They're comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how long I've been looking for a decent denim legging/jegging. I'm 6' tall and generally a size 18 and I have tried soooo many brands and sellers, even just for leggings to wear under a tunic, but always kinda hoped for comfy-but-sturdy jeggings that I could just wear normally and I FOUND THEM!! <3 These are fantastic. They're comfortable. They're well-made. They're not see-through. They're long! (Even on me!!) They feel like the perfect blend of legging and pants and I bought another pair JUST because I love them so much! I only wish I could buy them in black too, but they're out of my size (XX-Large) in black right now. (Hint, hint, seller!! lol)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you are fit.
customer_reviews.text: Way too long, and way too big through the waist. Also the rise is way too high and the calf and thigh area is way too tight so that when I walk, they fall down. I'm 5'4", and I'm an athletic 136. My measurements are 33-25-36, and my thighs measure 27" and calves measure 18".
customer_reviews.author: HKgrl

customer_reviews.title: Post Pregnancy Pants
customer_reviews.text: I just had a baby & was having a really hard time finding pants that were comfortable & that also fit. My maternity pants are now to big & my pre-pregnancy pants are too small. I love skinny jeans so I ordered these to give them a try. I love them! They fit just as expected. I am currently 180 pounds & ordered the medium. As I continue to lose the baby weight, I know these will still fit. If you are looking for something with an elastic waist but still want the denim look, these leggings are PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, but no.
customer_reviews.text: I have to take a pass on the white version of these jeggings. I took some photos wearing nude underwear. First of all, you absolutely must wear a very long shirt with them because the whole crotch/butt area looks ridiculous. But even the bright white seam running down the side of the legs looks awful. My skin tone is super light. These would look even worse on tan or dark skin tones. The softness and quality seems very nice but the appearance is super tacky. As for fit, I’m 5,7 1/2” and 140lbs. The medium fit fine. Just choose one of the darker options and skip the tacky white.
customer_reviews.author: JPNYC

customer_reviews.title: I love these! If you wear a longer top that ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these! If you wear a longer top that covers your mid-section, you can't tell that these are not actually skinny jeans. The color is realistic, and I like that they have pockets in the back for cell phone, etc. I tried wearing skinny jeans and found them very uncomfortable by the end of the day. I could wear these all day and not feel the pinch or bind. I received several compliments, and people have asked me if I have lost weight when I wear them. I think the dark color and "skinny" cut make them slimming. Would definitely buy in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Beck

customer_reviews.title: They look good!
customer_reviews.text: These look great! As others have stated, they are long. I ordered the small. I am 5'4" and 127 pounds. I wear a size 25/26 regular at Gap and a size 2 regular at most places. There is a good couple of inches at the bottom i had to fold over. I boughy these for a costume but will probubly wear them out. They are very comfortable and stretch well. Easy to chase after my boys in.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Arriaga

customer_reviews.title: Yessssss!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. In a size 12/14, 5'10" about 170 lbs and the large fits great. In ordering a couple more pairs 😍 so hard to find leggings that are long enough for my legs. With these I have room to spare!
customer_reviews.author: twinmomma14

customer_reviews.title: The look of jeans with the comfort of leggings
customer_reviews.text: Reading reviews is the best thing you can do when ordering anything online, especially clothing! I'm 5 ft 7 in, 145 pounds, and typically I would purchase Large legggings. However, other users suggested sizing down, saying these run big, and they were right! I ordered a Medium and they fit perfect. They're comfortable and soft, and a bit long, but for me that's fine because I'm pretty tall and will enjoy rolling these up on warmer days to wear as capris. They look very much like denim and for $14, they are a bargain. Much more comfortable than your average skinny jean. All in all, I would recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: AgentM87

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’3” and 150 pounds. I got Medium. They are thicker than expected. Definitely leaning on the jean versus legging side. Still have decent stretch. They are a little long on me. But cuffed is the current style so I might give that a try. I’ve been working on getting in shape so I will keep the medium but if that weren’t the case I’d recommend sizing up to a large. I’m not a fan of the muffin top myself and the medium is tighter on my middle than flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Utah

customer_reviews.title: Order one size down
customer_reviews.text: I ordered according to the size chart but should have ordered a small. The medium did fit good if you want a looser fit legging but it was too loose to be comfortable for me. I'm 5'4", 130lbs, 31" waist. They are also pretty long and I'm not sure I want to mess with hemming leggings. I did return these and will continue my search for petite leggings.
customer_reviews.author: Lisbeth Starr

customer_reviews.title: XL perfect fit for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'3, and I find it REALLY hard to find jeans that fit me. I have a curvy figure and also lift weights regularly so I have pretty big legs ...generally wear size 16. Usually jeans are falling down and too big to accomodate my legs, uncomfortable, or unflattering on me. I really like these they are flattering and stay on when i bend down. I think they are nice for my difficult to fit figure and I had no problem with the length. For me, i'd prefer to wear a tunic or longer shirt with them since they are very form fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and stretchy, and real back pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! I’m always having issues with jeans where they end up being too tight on the tummy area but too big other places. But with these they feel great. I’m 5 foot 7 about 130 pounds and the mediums fit wonderfully! Had to pull them up a little here and there. But my job requires me to move around a lot. Super comfy!! And can’t beat the price. I ordered another pair in the dark blue, and I hope the black ones fit just as well. I wish they were a tiny bit longer. But I really can’t complain for the comfort and price and the back pockets are real!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie

customer_reviews.title: I read the reviews but thought they would probably look like leggings either way
customer_reviews.text: WOW. I read the reviews but thought they would probably look like leggings either way, not to flattering, that I would probably have to wear with long shirts. NOT AT ALL. These feel like leggings (none of the bloating and hurting of jeans) but absolutely look like Jeans. And not from afar, they look like jeans up close. They can be worn with regular shirts and look so elegand and beautiful. Will definitely be buying in more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PILING AFTER 1st USE! STAY AWAY!
customer_reviews.text: I bought three pairs of these thinking they’d be worth the hype after reading about them in a buzzfeed article. I really like the amazon basic pull on jeans and I thought these would be a great alternative at a cheaper price. I wore two different pairs once and BOTH were piling after the first day of me wearing them. I only wore them to work. Not only are they super cheaply made but I didn’t find them flattering. They didn’t suck in any of my mom belly even though I am on the lower end of the size S (4-6). I’m a 4. STAY AWAY.
customer_reviews.author: Amber H

customer_reviews.title: Thighs will wear them down FAST
customer_reviews.text: 5'6" 200lbs. Got a large and an extra large since I'm losing weight. Extra large fits well, however it doesn't hold anything in like you expect leggings to do. Large is better, but if you have large calves it's going to be a struggle getting these on! Both are tight on the ankles! You cannot see through these at all, which is great! But if you have butt dimples (like all us fluffy ladies have), you'll be able to see them if the pants are to tight. Also, the chub rub from your thighs will wear these down FAST if you wear them often.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall women too.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are amazing for these leggings but I was a little skeptical about them fitting me because the description says the inseam is only 29 inches, and I’m 5’11” and have a 37 inch inseam but they actually fit me! They have enough stretch in them that they fit just as any other leggings do. I saw a lot of questions about short women but nothing about tall women so I hope this is helpful to all the ladies with the long legs.
customer_reviews.author: Lance & Amie

customer_reviews.title: Nice leggings; worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I had a lot of questions about these pants; so will answer the ones I couldn't find. First, size. I am a regular size 14 in most of my pants, but after reading a lot of reviews, I ordered the XL. Glad I did; for they were not tight but fit just right, and maybe a tiny bit of room in case of dryer shrinkage. I have the jeans color and wear those a lot; no problems washing. I also ordered the white ones, and they are of medium thickness, in that, you want light underwear for dark patterns are likely to show though. I found these well made. I would order more if there were more colors.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Sykes

customer_reviews.title: NOT denim, just “denim look”
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Had gotten some No Nonsense denim leggings in a brick and mortar store—love them. Thought these were the same, but they absolutely are NOT. If you want real denim you need to get No Nonsense “Classic Denim.” Don’t be fooled.
customer_reviews.author: sart29

customer_reviews.title: Flattering fit. The ankles are cut a little wide
customer_reviews.text: I am 5’3 and was 176 before delving baby - 8-9 weeks in i was about 155 and ready to wear more than just leggings - I got a size 6 which worked well. I considered an 8 but the 6 was good. Snug but I wanted that and the waste is high enough that snug is a good thing. My only complaint is that the ankles are a little wider than I expect in a denim/leggings marketed as skinny - so when I cuffed them the cuff looks like.... not skinny, not boot cut. But in between. Anyway they work, and highly rec for the price esp for post baby denim
customer_reviews.author: Lo Mac

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Perrrrrtfect im in love . Fit as expected looks like denim but feels like leggings . Perfect cut meaning small waist wider hips and thighs exactly how i am its not straight cut . For refrence I bought a size M im (29 in ) waist (40 in ) hips (5-2" ) and 130 pounds
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Really super comfortable, but they do stretch as you wear ...
customer_reviews.text: These are cute for how inexpensive they are. Really super comfortable, but they do stretch as you wear them. I bought the XL which are fine until they stretch after a couple hours, so then bought the L and those stretch just enough so they are comfortable and still fitting correctly. I am size 14-16 and 5'9". These are also plenty long enough and have the correct taper for my calves/ankles which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfy!! I'm going to have to buy multiple pair! I just had a baby so my "real" jeans don't fit. These are a life saver. Very soft, thick quality material. They are not see through. I'm 5'9, 170 and ordered the mediums. They are the perfect size and even long enough to fully cover my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: mica williams

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!! Update with sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I love these pants!! They are so soft and comfy! They are comfy and fit like yoga pants but feel like jeans without all the pinching. Definitely buying these again! Side note: As a wheelchair user, these are much much more comfortable to wear than jeans. Update: I bought these before in a medium and they were a bit too tight so this time I ordered the next size up, large, and they were like 5 sizes bigger, so loose there is no way they would have stayed on. What the heck?? Their soooo comfy so I’ll try again but sizing is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: M Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Too thick fabric to fit right
customer_reviews.text: I’m a positive person and give positive reviews on 99% of my Amazon purchases. I’m a tall female 5’11” 190 and I wear leggings like 98% of all women - we love our leggings! I’ve been a 30-plus year customer of Hanes products, but nearly 4 MONTHS after buying this item I’m still disappointed at the fit, they just “pull” down even if I don’t take a single step. They are too thick and don’t provide hug/support on a woman’s curves. These don’t become part of you—ladies you know what I mean. I think this is only, if ever, the 2nd time I returned any leggings. Target’s cheaper brand I returned because they were sheer/thin. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great Leggings!
customer_reviews.text: Was a little apprehensive about ordering the small vs. the medium (I’m right in between sm & med) and took a chance on the small since the medium wasn’t Prime for some reason. I was pleasantly surprised as the small fit like a glove. A little snug but they stretch a bit. I’m 5’5” (with a 30” inseam) ~ 125# with 35” hips. I have problems with leggings/pants being long enough and these hit me just below the ankle, which is where I like them. Would recommend these leggings and am looking at ordering another pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Cbrn

customer_reviews.title: Great value active denim replacement
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and looks like jeans, minus the elastic waste band and lack of real zipper, but the stitching it spot on and back pockets are real. I joke that these are “real” jeans. I think they’re comparable to active denim, but a much better price. I can do yoga in these or lounge, but feel like I’m “dressed” and wear them out as well. I’m on the shorter side and feel like the inseam is a little long, but it’s not a deal breaker. Most things fit longer on me, so I’m used to it. The material is definitely thicker than most leggings (I wear primarily LLR brand, and feel like these are thicker and have tighter weave).
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Too small, very tight, very high in the waist, stiff fabric and way too long
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several pairs of No Nonsense leggings in other colors in the same size and love them but this was the first time I bought the denim ones. I have denim leggings by other manufacturers and they are fine. These ones were small, very tight, very high in the waist, stiff fabric and way too long (I'm just shy of 5'8" so its not that I am short). I ended up giving them to the thrift shop.
customer_reviews.author: cautious buyer

customer_reviews.title: Fit info for medium size.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure I bought the wrong size. I’m Five foot two, 135lbs muscular build (weightlifter) I bought a medium because my quads are beefy. The legs fit width wise but were maybe 6 inches too long. Whatever I could have hemmed them. The crotch fit so saggy there was no way to wear these. Maybe if I had a pooch or was pregnant these might work. The material is nice; not too thin but moves with you. The dark wash color is great. These might work well for women with long thin legs and a little tummy. They were a miss fit my build :(
customer_reviews.author: Jenni M.

customer_reviews.title: Not curvy girl friendly.
customer_reviews.text: The waist fit just fine. But I live a pretty active lifestyle, so my thighs are pretty thick... Surmise to say that the first day I wore them (just around the office, nowhere crazy) there's already a hole in the inseam. Imagine my disappointment. The style is cute and they're super comfortable, but I haven't even washed them yet (fresh out of the package) and already they're messed up. $19.99 for leggings I can't wear. I am not a happy customer. (ordered in a M)
customer_reviews.author: A.P.

customer_reviews.title: Nice white joggings.
customer_reviews.text: Nice compromise between jean and leggings. I'm 5'9" 140 lbs and the medium fit, though a bit snug, keeping as I'm 5lbs overweight should be perfect at 135lbs. My original order pair came with what looked like a blood spot on leg. Amazon prime sent me a replacement pair and received 2 days later. Returning the first pair. I would buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: BookWormRose

customer_reviews.title: Will be getting more
customer_reviews.text: I like the look and feel of these jeggings. Only worn once so I'll see how they hold up after washing but material feels sturdy. I will be hanging them to dry. I'm 5ft 3in and length is good. My weight should be 125 but I have 35 to 40 pounds extra sitting in my gut, butt, and thighs. The jeggings still fit good, about an inch below belly button. I'd prefer alittle higher but that is probably due to my shape. I do wear long tops to hide my middle. Doesnt feel like they are choking me anywhere. Overall I am very happy with purchase and glad I took the chance to try them.
customer_reviews.author: nanny

customer_reviews.title: True to size but not good fabric
customer_reviews.text: I guess the size is true to fit because I ordered an Xl thinking it would run small and they are way too big on me I can’t even try to make them work. Also, I didn’t realize the material was actual legging like I thought it was jeans but stretchy and it’s super weird fabric that I wouldn’t wear in public. Sadly; I need to return these as I won’t be wearing them. Oh and there was a tiny stain on the back just like someone else’s review said.
customer_reviews.author: Delaware tay

customer_reviews.title: White is very tight and shows a bit too much for my liking
customer_reviews.text: I had a black version of this legging and it was great. I bought a white one from Amazon and it appears to be slightly smaller, to the point that it looks too binding. With the white color, every imperfection in the body curve will show. Also, although the fabric isn't thin, the white one is still somewhat see-through if you wear a very dark underwear on light skin tone. Wearing nude color or anything very close to your skin tone would be fine. Returned. I personally prefer the classic denim line. It's a bit thinner but stretcher and easier to fit.
customer_reviews.author: kittyworld

customer_reviews.title: A moms new favorite pair of everyday jeans!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Inexpensive, comfortable, stylish for casual wear to office with sweater/blazer and for weekend wear with tall boots. 5'3 tall, wear 14-16 petite size. Ordered two Dark Denim color pair in Large and X-Large. Large is a little too fitted at the waist for me, X-Large is much more comfortable. A little long at the bottom, perfect for Regular/Tall fits, but still looks good on petite. I cannot wear stiff, tight jeans anymore. Ordering another pair in black. Please keep these in stock! Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: These jeggings are surprisingly great quality for the price. They are not as thick as jeans but definitely not super thin like some other brand jeggings. This helps to keep a nice body shape without showing too much dippling. They are super comfortable. I got the XL size and wear a size 14. The size is great because they are not skin tight and overly stretched. They are not super high waisted but are high enough where they don’t ride down when you bend. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LaniMetz

customer_reviews.title: Look like black leggings, not jeans
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that these look like black leggings, not denim. On the plus side, the waistband is comfortable and the material is thick. I love the No Nonsense jeggings in the Dark Denim color. Because of the fabric and stitching, the Dark Demin ones really look like jeans. These black ones don't look like denim. The fit of these black ones is the same as the Dark Denim.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Tronic

customer_reviews.title: Love these leggings
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger than my normal size because I didn't want these leggings to be too tight. I have another pair from a different company and they fit super tight like Spanx. It worked out great. They are tight enough but still comfortable to wear. The length is good. I'm 5'6" and they hit right below my ankle bone. They look good with boots or flats. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bluemmsrule

customer_reviews.title: Snug fit and they look nice
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, nice and snug. I purchased a large. After having my baby I wanted to wear something comfortable. Just as others mentioned in their reviews, these pants tend to roll slightly from the front. I found it a bit annoying however I didn't regret my purchase. The color doesn't fade out after several washes. When I first tried them on my husband thought I was wearing regular Jean's. Overall they look and feel nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Skinny legs? Order size smaller!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9" about 160 lbs. I usually buy size 10-12 in leggings and pants. I have a thick waist but pretty skinny legs. The size L was fine at the waist but made me look dumpy. The legs were loose and flappy! Not cute at all. I'll be returning them. Argh!
customer_reviews.author: BreeElle

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of jeggings!
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of jeggings! I have very muscular legs so I absolutely love how easy they are to fit my legs! They are comfy, soft, and a great price! I’m on the short side of 5’1 so I do have to roll them but they look fine and I can’t wait to wear them with boots this fall! Bought a large due to being worried about the sizing for my muscular legs but they were a little loose so I just ordered a different pair in a medium!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great and looks just like jeans but much more comfy. I have to wear plain jeans for work and regular jeans start to chafe and leave wearmarks. I ordered a small and they fit great. My waist is 27-29 and hips 36.5
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Best jeggings ever !!
customer_reviews.text: They holy grail of jeggings !! I tell all of my friends about these ! I will say I bought 3 pairs of the dark denim in a medium in 2017, and this new set is different ! I would say softer and run bigger ! I ordered mediums like I did prior and they were slouchy in waist and knees ! I kept, but ordered a small, and fit like a glove !!!! My husband always says dang cover that up woman when I wear these hahaha! For reference I’m 5”5, 140, and small frame . Normally a 6 in jeans, which lets be real I’m giving those away !!! Buy now ! Run!
customer_reviews.author: Brandy30

customer_reviews.title: Finally jeans without wearing jeans!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought these because I haven’t worn jeans in over a year since having a kid... OMG I LOVE THESE!!!! They make me feel like I’m wearing jeans again without all the hassle of finding ones that fit all the ways they’re supposed to and the tightness and uncomfortableness.... my body is weird after having a kid and these are the first leggings that don’t make me feel like I’m wearing leggings and instead I feel like an adult lol... I think I need a pair for every day of the week!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Mostly Cotton & Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Pay attention to NoNonsense. Their products are usually good. I bought these jeggings based on reviews, brand, price, and fact that they are almost 80% natural cotton. Avoid man-made materials - it's like wearing a plastic bag, your body cannot breathe or sweat. I ordered my usual size (large, size 12, 5'8", 174 lb). But, Large was rather tight. I hate the shimmying, tugging, pulling to get them on. Don't remind me I need to lose 25-30 lb. I then ordered XLg and sent Lg back. Comfortable, nicer fit, but not baggy, allows cotton to shrink if it happens. Also like pocket in back. I will wear them, see if I'll order them again.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely horrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: I’m amazed that this has such great reviews. The quality is horrible. They were shipped in a ball with a piece of paper and tape wrapped around. By the time I got it opened I was already over this product. The fit is absolutely horrible and sizing is way off. They are leggings and don’t look like jeans at all. I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jr. Wino

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got two pair of these and they are very comfortable. They look like real jeans and I get complimenteds about them all the time. I ordered the black and the dark blue. I usually wear an 8 or 10 in pants, but I bought the large anyway. I know these are to be fitted, but I did not want them too tight. I am glad I went up a size. They fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: KGonza

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!
customer_reviews.text: These are my go-to jeggins! OK, the dark blue ones are. I was hoping to mix things up with black, but it's a dark blue black with gold stitching and hard to tell apart from the dark blue. Next to a black shirt one can tell they are black, but it's a tough call. I might give them a dunk in black RIT dye. Great fit. Great sturdy fabric. Nothing shows through. True to size and wash well. This brand has been amazing over the years, and I expect they will get a good black color soon.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great price, ordered a second pair.
customer_reviews.text: Why are pants, jeggings, and leggings so expensive? The price on these were amazing. If I get the winter out of them, I’ll be happy! Well made. Nice stretch. Not see-through. Comfortable fit. Material not super soft but ok. I’m short, 5 feet tall so they are long. I’m 190 and full in the booty. I ordered the XL. I probably could fit into a large if I wanted a tighter fit. I ordered a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Murray

customer_reviews.title: So Comfy Yet Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I haven't written a product review in a while, but these jeggings inspired me to come and give my feedback. They are the most comfortable leggings I would ever wear out. I don't wear regular leggings outside my home--I'm a jeans girl. but these jeggings--while stretchy--look just like pure denim, and they are figure-flattering. I've spent all day in them, and I'm coming back to buy another dark-wash pair and a black pair. caussion to short people like myself, though. These are extremely long. I had to get them shortened. But now that they are the correct length, I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Bee PrackTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very stretchy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in Size Large. I am 5'6", 140 ish pounds. I typically wear a size 8-10 in jeans. I have thick legs. These pants were too large for me. They hung awkward around my bum and thighs. But they fit me in the calves. I didn't like the color or the "denim" material. Very stretchy though. Material was also thin, but didn't seem see through.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful,soft,but way too long!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ughhh I really wish it were shorter, I really loved it I was so sad....The shape and especially the Softness of the fabric Wow!!!! Im 5'4.5,130lbs got the Medium, fit beautifully but I just didn't like how it went all the way to 'my thighs...such a pity!!! If you are looking for this length or are 5'9 or taller then I'd highly recommend getting it!
customer_reviews.author: rach3rd

customer_reviews.title: Great Jean!
customer_reviews.text: These are very comparable to my favorite VeraWang stretch denim at literally 1/4 the cost. Purchased a size Large, fit exactly as the chart described. (I’d say Size 10,12) SUPER long legs tho, had to roll the bottom (but I usually have the same issue with all my jeans- these required 3 cuffs at the ankle instead if my usual 2). I have a big behind, thick thighs, and a smaller waist. No knee wrinkles (us tree trunk legs know what I’m talking about). No gaps at the back or anything like that. Great fit, great price, great product! Will be ordering a second pair- or two! Nice and dark color!
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm pleased
customer_reviews.text: Wife comments - I delivered a baby recently and I'm dropping the extra weight slowly. First looked at the size chart and compared my measurements. I thought I would need the XXL. It came on time, but was almost falling off me. It was very loose around my waist and legs. So I exchanged for size L. Size L is a little snug, but fits more like I wanted leggings to fit. It hugs the legs and waist much better. Its not quite strong enough to hold everything in nicely for long term. I've had to restitch a few seems, but overall I'm pleased with how they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick T Weaver

customer_reviews.title: True to size!
customer_reviews.text: Reviews stated that these were true to size. I had my doubts but ordered the large. Yep. They fit! I have slacks and leggings in my closet ranging from size 10 - 14 or M-XL. I hate vanity sizing and erroneous sizing. When shopping in person and alone, I have to take 2-3 different sizes of one garment into the change room with me. I like Amazon's customer reviews. Saves a lot of wear and tear on my patience!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clothing not made logically
customer_reviews.text: The ankles are disproportionately small. So, no matter how big the waist, I cant pull them up. A larger person will have larger ankles. This is illogical and not flattering or useful. Since 1992 I have suffered with this bizarre clothing manufacturing method. Get a pattern from 1991 or earlier and use it so women can look not so stupid. Actually measure the distance up to the belly button. This new fit will never look good or be comfortable as it has nothing to do with the female form. Please make clothing properly. Please use a measuring tape and a pattern. Please ensure all of the garment is the same size. So people can actually wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't pass for jeans
customer_reviews.text: They're really light and comfortable. The thing I don't like is that I wanted jeggings that would pass for jeans. The reason they don't is because when they stretch you can see a white material underneath the denim like material. If whatever that is matched the denim then it would work perfectly. I ordered these because I just had this same issue with another brand so I was disappointed cause now I bought 2 pairs that I can't wear to work but are nice and comfy. At least I can happily wear them at home
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit, dye transfer
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these hoping they'd be the same as a pair of Faded Glory jeggings I've been using for post-maternity wear. They look the same and I can't get to the store right now to find another pair like mine. They're not even similar. These have loose legs and a small, too tight top with a rise that's too low, not the fit that's pictured. They also had a warning tag that they'd transfer dye before AND after laundering. No thanks, I don't need to be turned blue and have my other laundry stained. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Minions

customer_reviews.title: Altered from 2017---but still a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: The 2017 version of this item had heavier fabric, was higher-waisted, and had a slightly wider waistband....but it is still definitely acceptable, nonetheless ! I will probably order another pair. They are very comfortable--and look great with a long shirt that covers the tummy and rear. I am not overweight--but due to my age, I do have "a tummy" that needs comfort--and concealing as best one can.
customer_reviews.author: Joan K.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite "jeans"
customer_reviews.text: Loooooooove them! I'm 5'6", 186lbs and the large fit like a glove. The length is also perfect. They look like jeans but feel like leggings. Back pickets are deep enough to hold my iPhone 6 Plus while getting moderate exercise bending and lifting. My favorite part is no button or zipper, they pull easily on and off ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buying another pair!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are new favorites! I often find that various pairs run too short, especially after washing/drying, but these hold up well and have excellent length. The fabric has a light texture and isn't as heavy as denim, which makes it more flexible, but it also isn't a flimsy, thin knit or overly see-through. These leggings also have a nicely comfortable fit -- fitted but no wrangling one leg in and wondering if you'll fall over on the closet floor, trying to inch them up. Will definitely be purchasing a spare pair.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri V

customer_reviews.title: Keep sliding down
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10" and 170lbs and these pants were skin tight. I returned and got the xl which fit very nice and look very nice when I tried them on. But they slide down when you walk and sit so am constantly pulling them back up. (Didn't wear them for a few weeks after I got them)They will definitely not get worn much and since I threw the tags away won't get returned. Didn't notice reviews saying that they didn't stay up. Maybe if you have nice thin legs they do.
customer_reviews.author: Reads a lot

customer_reviews.title: Great for long legs
customer_reviews.text: Have only tried them on so far but seem great. The are long! Perfect for me, but if you have short legs these will be way too long. Sizing seems accurate - I’m usually a small or size 2 and go back and forth between regular and long length depending on the brand and these are perfect. The upper portion needs more - structure? Support? Not sure the word I am looking for, but the waist area feels/looks like a legging and wouldn’t pass for jeans so I’ll mostly be wearing these under things. A thick waistband would make them much more flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: While I was initially pleased with this purchase, after wearing multiple times I kind of wish I could return them. The fit is good and mostly flattering (I'm wearing XL), the length is abysmal. I hate pants that don't reach your ankles, and these have to be constantly pulled down because they ride up on my legs; also for some strange reason the left leg of the pants keeps twisting around so the inseam is on the top or bottom of my leg instead of on the inner side like it should be. Overall it's an okay purchase, but honestly the Amazon brand leggings were much higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. McCorvey

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, solid fabric, good value!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't expect these to be so comfortable but they are more comfortable than the regular leggings, nice surprise. I'm 5'6" 1/2 and these are about the right length, maybe a touch long so keep that in mind if you are shorter or taller. Material is thicker than the no nonsense regular legging which I wish I would have found out sooner as they would have been fantastic for winter but are fine for warmer weather as well. They fit a little looser than skin tight leggings especially at the knee and below but not baggy at all. All in all I think these are a great value and will buy more pairs.
customer_reviews.author: HollyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Not really a fan. These are good to bum around in, but they kinda visibly look like jeggings. At least for me, the goal is to have them look like jeans. The fabric stretches and gives after a short while and a few washes. The seams split slightly (tiny little holes where they're stitched together). For reference, I bought an XL. I treat these just like sweatpants almost because they hold me in about the same way, and I feel a little too "comfy looking" in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: The perfect jegging!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect jegging. They fit like a legging. Super soft and comfortable to wear all day but with the look of a jean. My girlfriends were all shocked when I told them that they weren't a real pair of jeans! The only reason I am giving it four stars is that I ordered black and they are definitely blue. But if you are looking for something super comfy that can be dressed up or down, worn to work or casually at home then these are the jeggings for you. They wash really well and I must have washed these over twenty times now and they still look new. No fading and no shrinkage. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bradley

customer_reviews.title: No thanks
customer_reviews.text: These pants fit horribly. According to the size chart I should have gotten a medium as I'm a size 10 but I got a large just in case and they were still too small. On top of that the pair I received was longer in the front than in the back. I know they are cheap, but my goodness!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best fitting!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love these leggings, I’m glad I ordered 2 pairs. I’m 5,9 size14 bottoms, and ordered the extra lg. I’m 32 weeks so I didn’t know how these would actually fit. But they’re so comfortable, theres enough stretch for me to pull them over my stomach but the are actually comfortable enough at my waistline. The length is great, and there is no sagging in the crotch or but area after wearing them all day. I’ll prob order more.
customer_reviews.author: Deja

customer_reviews.title: Nice material pants
customer_reviews.text: I love the look. The material is soft and made of good quality. The fit is more like low rise or low riders, so I have to keep pulling them up over my backside. Besides having to pull the pants up constantly, the fit in other areas, like the thighs and the length is okay. I ordered two pairs, black and white. The white pair actually fit much better around my backside; but they are much thinner and wearing trouser spanks will make things look smooth if you have cellulite. I ordered my true size, XL, but perhaps going up one size could've been better.
customer_reviews.author: Cherished

customer_reviews.title: OMG THESE ARE AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: These have officially become my favorite pair of pants. I own both the black, and the dark blue and wear them ALL the time. They look just like jeans, and have butt pockets I can keep my phone in. They are snug, but not overly tight and are very flattering to your figure. They are super soft and stretchy like leggings, but with a look and outside feel of a soft jean. Much warmer than a pair of leggings, so in the cold winter months my legs are not freezing. I wish they came in more colors/styles because I would buy them all!
customer_reviews.author: Ariana Mcwilliams

customer_reviews.title: I never want to take these off!
customer_reviews.text: I spent about an hour shopping on Amazon for just the right dark blue jeggings, based on price and comments, and I am SO glad I got these! I'm 5'1" 140lbs and am usually between a 10-12 so I ordered the Large to avoid the obviously-spandex look, and they are PERFECT! I wear them to work on casual Fridays and get tons of compliments - nobody would ever guess they aren't just skinny jeans. Now I'm back to buy another pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: Redclover1027

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable stretchy denim
customer_reviews.text: I am 5'6 145lbs curvy and I ordered the Large, It feels like I am just wearing comfortable leggins! I bought two pairs because I liked them so much, I don't feel restricted at all wearing these, the waist gives you plenty of room without falling down, I was worried too big but they weren't at all because when you sit down gut needs more room, does not fall down from waist, looks very nice too like you are wearing jeans but doens't feel like jeans at all, I don't like wearing jeans but these are good!
customer_reviews.author: Ajoneil

customer_reviews.title: I reeeally wish these came in XS!
customer_reviews.text: These jeggings are very comfortable! Because they sit closely to the skin, they're also warm. I really like the higher placement of the back pockets. When the butt pockets are lower, there's a lot of bunched material on my backside. Unfortunately, size Small is quite big on me. I had to have them taken in around the butt/thigh area and hemmed. The waist could be a teeny bit smaller, too. I would LOVE to have the choice of an XS. With XS, I'm pretty sure I wouldn't wear anything else. For reference, I'm 4'11", 100 lbs with a 24/25 waist and 34/35 hips.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: My daily leggings
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through a couple of these, I own about 6 pairs and wear them on an every day basis. I lost one when it was machine washed with a jacket which had a bulky zipper, the zipper stripped away some of material on the legging, now it's become my indoor pants. Another two expired when hole started appearing in the top corner of the back pockets. I use my back pockets occasionally to hold my iphone SE.... that could be the issue but it's definitely a weak point. But at the price, it really doesn't matter... I donate the holey ones and just buy another pair :P
customer_reviews.author: Felix

customer_reviews.title: Nice! But get baggy.
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy these leggings! They're thick enough that I can wear them as pants with no hesitation (I'm a firm believer that leggings aren't pants, normally). They also look nice enough that I can wear them with a nice top to church or work. The pockets are great, and hold my phone (Galaxy S9) easily without me worrying it will fall out. My only complaint is that they seem a little big. Right when I put them on they're really good, but after an hour or two they get baggy around my knees. Not sure if that's a fabric issue or if I should've sized down. Either way, I like them a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Emilie

customer_reviews.title: They don't Last Long
customer_reviews.text: I got a size up because of the measurements and it was just slightly too big. Not an issue, I wore them anyway because they were really comfortable. I haven't had them that long and they started ripping where the back pockets are attached to the main pant. Also the fabric started to wear down between the legs. I appreciate that they are made in larger sizes, however, they are made in poor quality. I would suggest to take these down for sized XL and up, and create a whole new line with more durable fabric. I'll pay slightly more if they last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Col'Lette Gauvin

customer_reviews.title: Too small by far
customer_reviews.text: When I received these pants, I was so excited that I completely tore into the package... totally destroying it. Based on my knowledge of the brand, I expected these to fit, as all of my pull on style leggings are a medium. That being said, I also removed the tags...they were placed in such a way as to make it difficult to try the pants on. Sadly, I should have never removed the tags. I couldn't even get these on past my lower legs...they wouldn't even go past my calves. So unless you have pencil thin legs...size up ladies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality differs amongst colors
customer_reviews.text: I own two pairs of the regular blue jeggings and one pair of the black jeggings. The black pair is very low quality compared to the blue ones. The fabric looks cheaper and feels thinner. They also run smaller than the blue pairs and are just generally uncomfortable. I really like my blue pairs, although one of them has a hole above the back pocket after wearing a handful of times and two washes. The blue jeggings are soft and comfortable with the perfect amount of stretch. They are very flattering. I recommend the dark blue cut, but I can't in good conscious recommend the black pair to literally anyone.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Fit and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'8" and fluctuate between 150-155 lbs. I have thick thighs and a plump booty. I also have a chubby tummy and love have love handles. These really do hug the right places and forgive the not so nice places. It doesn't flatten my butt, but it does flatten my tummy. The waste is high enough that it doesn't dig in or create a muffin top. The length is perfect too. I will definitely be buying these in other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure of the correct size because I have a large derrière but I went with the large and they were perfect. I’m normally a size 11/12 and usually fit in large but sometimes I need an XL (I’m 5’4, 165lbs, 32” waist and 44” hips). These pants are super comfy and feel like they move with you. I am definitely going to buy more pairs, love them!
customer_reviews.author: SillyGurl

customer_reviews.title: Ordered black, but it's really very dark navy
customer_reviews.text: I like them well enough, but what they call black is really dark navy. In my rather dark apartment in ambient light they looked black enough. But, once I got outside and noticed the color against my black socks and fleece jacket, they are clearly not really black. Otherwise, they seem to be nicely made and fit well. I was looking for a replacement of the Faded Glory brand from WM that are not available anymore. They are a pretty close match in terms of fit.
customer_reviews.author: Annabanana

customer_reviews.title: True to size!
customer_reviews.text: I am almost 5'8" and weigh 138lbs. I ordered a medium. They fit perfect and to my surprise were actually long enough in length! These are comfortable, soft and stretchy. They are very flattering on my frame. I like that the waist of the pants comes to about belly button height. I love them so much I ordered another pair. These are true to size. I always wear a size medium and these mediums fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Seagle-Amaya

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: This product is mainly for smaller, more petite women. While it may fit larger bodies, the style loses its flattery. The small, widely spaced pockets make a round butt look ridiculous at best, flat and wide at worst. It also puts every imperfection on display, making me feel less attractive than I actually am. The material is like a combination of denim and leggings, which will be fine if you don't mind jeans. I'm personally not a fan of denim material and would prefer something more breathable. Bottom line: I would not feel confident in these at all.
customer_reviews.author: Talley

customer_reviews.title: So Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these leggings/Jeggings. They are so comfortable. I bought the black pair and they look amazing and fit great. I received compliments the first time I wore them and most people were surprised that they where not real jeans especially since they have back pockets (which more importantly are big enough for my iPhone 8 Plus.) I already ordered another pair. Don't be fooled when you receive them as they come looking more like leggings (I almost didn't try them on) but once I did try them on I realized how amazing they are. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy Love

customer_reviews.title: Super stretchy and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for stretchy jeggings that weren’t actually jean material because they tend to bunch up in unflattering places or I’m constantly having to pull them up to keep them from sliding. These were exactly what I was looking for! Thicker than your normal leggings but thin enough to hug your body without sliding around! And super stretchy! I ordered the dark denim one, and they look just like real jeans. At 5’3” and 135 pounds, I ordered a medium and these were a bit too long for me, so I ended up just folding them at the ankles. It fit really well everywhere else. I wish they had more colors, like a light denim!
customer_reviews.author: A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice pants
customer_reviews.text: They are nice but heavier than I expected, but decided to keep anyway. I live in Florida and was a little concerned that they would be too hot in the summer. They fit well, a little tight, but then again, I am new to the "leggings" family. They look good and are plenty long enough. I am 5'8" and 180 lbs and I bought XL.
customer_reviews.author: MarieC

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: I just got these today and I love them! I’m in between a 14-16 5’7 195 ish 42D athletic curvy and they fit perfectly with definitely some room. I have muscular calves and they fit great. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: leslie h

customer_reviews.title: Easy breezy jeggings
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so here’s the thing: I wear these jeggings ALL THE TIME, but for some reason, I just don’t want to give 5 stars. They are super easy to wear, extremely comfortable, stay on the waist without rolling or folding, and are a good length for my 5’7” height. I guess my only criticism is that they aren’t convincing as jeans. The fabric is soft and stretchy, which is amazing in terms of wearability, but I wanted something that looks a little more like denim. Maybe some wiskering or a little distressing would help. This is my first pair of jeggings and I’d say they’re a great entry/gateway into this mama-wardrobe-staple, but I’m still on the hunt for something better.
customer_reviews.author: T KarcherTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: They're ok.
customer_reviews.text: I thought I ordered a large but evidently I ordered a medium. It fits though! I'm 5'5 and about 180lbs. I typically wear a size large at like Walmart or Target and a size 10 in stretchy jeans. I'm at that weird point where a 12 is too big and a 10 is kind of snug. I will say I do like these but but honestly $18 is too much. I will keep these because I am satisfied enough. They just feel like cheap $8 leggings from Walmart. They are flattering though and they do have pockets in the back. It is a little misleading to just say they have pockets though. I wish they had a wider waistband.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B.

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable pair of jeggings I've owned!
customer_reviews.text: Looks like jeans, fits like leggings, what's not to love?? I am 5'3 and typically wear a size 8 pants. I ordered a medium & they fit great! The calves seemed a little snug at first, but once I wore them for a day, I grew accustomed to it & it doesn't bother me anymore. Most comfortable pair of jeggings I've owned!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the dark denim. To me these are more like pajama bottoms. They are extremely comfortable but do not look like real denim and they have no support, but a lot of stretch. They don't hold their shape very well through the day (get kind of saggy) and definitely don't hold your stomach in at all. If you are looking for super comfort then YES, buy them, for style--DEFINITELY NOT. I'm 5'4" and they are pretty long as well. I had to cuff them. Fine for something comfortable to bum around in.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, doubt they'll last
customer_reviews.text: 1 year update: These've turned into my favorite pair of pants. They're in the weekly rotation, sometimes multiple times a week. The pilling stopped. So comfortable, and still fit great even though I've gained weight! ----------------------------------------------- 5'2", 144 lbs, medium fits fantastic except they were too long, so I hemmed them. The only reason I knocked off stars is cuz I'm getting slight pilling on the inside upper thighs, at the very first wear! The fit and look are perfect, but if they're already starting to pill on the first wear, I don't see them lasting long. :((
customer_reviews.author: chicken26

customer_reviews.title: Favorite jeggings
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Super comfortable, and they look great. One thing I really like how they don’t slide down - I’m not constantly tugging them up. They’ve got good stretch and hold their shape. I’m glad there’s back pockets, but front pockets would be great too! I took off one star because they don’t really look like denim. The stitching helps them to look like jeans, but everyone will know they’re jeggings.
customer_reviews.author: LisaN

customer_reviews.title: True to size!
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect!!! I am a 16/18 and ordered a 2x. They fit so well. They do not look like jeggings but real jeans. They have pockets in the back. They have a good stretch and can be pulled over the tummy if you want which is an extra super plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: LadyInRed

product_meta.title: No nonsense Women's Denim Leggings With Pockets
feature_bullets: The look of denim with total comfort
Faux front pockets and fly, real back pockets
Topstitching on pockets, side seam and leg openings
Every day wardrobe essential, style meets comfort and value
